data.persona: I only mastered one spell in witch school. I can speak with inanimate objects. I use this spell in espionage. I work for the government.
data.description:
You are in the Behind the Servant Quarters.
Dirty and dismal. This wasteland sprawls behind the Servant Quarters. It is where all the filth from kingdom is dumped.
There's a bag, a rock, and a filth from kingdom here.
The homeless person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop the rock so that I can pick up the bag and check its contents.
data.mid_motivation: I am going to look through the filth in the Servant Quarters to gather some information about a spy disguised as a servant.
data.long_motivation: I am going to perform really well so that I can get promoted.
